sections.title: Technomancer (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Technomancer class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Technomancer)
sections.description: A technomancer gains proficiency with all firearms, allowing them to use these technological weapons without penalty.

sections.title: Recondition (Su) (Technomancer)
sections.description: A technomancer can maintain timeworn technology to prevent glitching and allow normal recharging through 8 hours of work and daily maintenance.

sections.title: Technical Expertise (Ex) (Technomancer)
sections.description: A technomancer adds their class level to Craft, Disable Device, Knowledge (engineering), and Linguistics checks related to technology.

sections.title: Efficient Construction (Ex) (Technomancer)
sections.description: A technomancer reduces energy expenditure of technological crafting labs by 25% at 2nd level and 50% at 10th level.

sections.title: Technic Spell Mastery (Ex) (Technomancer)
sections.description: A technomancer selects technology-related spells to add to their spell list and can prepare or cast them additional times per day.

sections.title: Arcane Battery (Su) (Technomancer)
sections.description: A technomancer can expend spell slots as a swift action to provide charges to technological devices at 1 charge per spell level.

sections.title: Study Technology (Ex) (Technomancer)
sections.description: A technomancer can study robots, technological objects, or traps as a move action to gain competence bonuses against them.

sections.title: Recycle Technology (Ex) (Technomancer)
sections.description: A technomancer can dismantle technological items for crafting potential based on their condition, creating new timeworn items from the parts.

sections.title: Command Robot (Sp) (Technomancer)
sections.description: A technomancer can issue commands to robots within 30 feet as a standard action, functioning like suggestion but affecting robot constructs.

sections.title: Unified Energy (Su) (Technomancer)
sections.description: A technomancer can consume charges from technological devices to cast spells without expending spell slots, using 2 charges per spell level.

sections.title: Applied Learning (Ex) (Technomancer)
sections.description: A technomancer completely avoids technological effects on successful saving throws instead of taking reduced effects.

sections.title: Field Improvisation (Ex) (Technomancer)
sections.description: A technomancer can recycle technology at incredible speed, with each hour counting as 8 hours of crafting and temporary reconditioning.
